PackageOracle.name: DA_CONTROLLER
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_CONTROLLER
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.48.027330000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,controller_nm IN VARCHAR2
,controller_abbreviated_nm IN VARCHAR2
,controller_equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,vod_library_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,controller_nm IN VARCHAR2
,controller_abbreviated_nm IN VARCHAR2
,controller_equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,vod_library_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,controller_location_id IN NUMBER
,controller_nm IN VARCHAR2
,controller_abbreviated_nm IN VARCHAR2
,controller_equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,vod_library_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,controller_location_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_controller;

body.name: DA_CONTROLLER
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CONTROLLER
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.48.042073000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,controller_nm IN VARCHAR2
,controller_abbreviated_nm IN VARCHAR2
,controller_equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,vod_library_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_controller.add(fx), parms=' || controller_nm || '|' || controller_abbreviated_nm || '|' || controller_equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || vod_library_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_controller a
(
a.controller_location_id
,a.controller_nm
,a.controller_abbreviated_nm
,a.controller_equip_prod_inst_id
,a.vod_library_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_controller_location_id.NEXTVAL
,add.controller_nm
,add.controller_abbreviated_nm
,add.controller_equip_prod_inst_id
,add.vod_library_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.controller_location_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_controller.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,controller_nm IN VARCHAR2
,controller_abbreviated_nm IN VARCHAR2
,controller_equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,vod_library_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_controller.add, parms=' || controller_nm || '|' || controller_abbreviated_nm || '|' || controller_equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || vod_library_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_controller a
(
a.controller_location_id
,a.controller_nm
,a.controller_abbreviated_nm
,a.controller_equip_prod_inst_id
,a.vod_library_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_controller_location_id.NEXTVAL
,add.controller_nm
,add.controller_abbreviated_nm
,add.controller_equip_prod_inst_id
,add.vod_library_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_controller.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,controller_location_id IN NUMBER
,controller_nm IN VARCHAR2
,controller_abbreviated_nm IN VARCHAR2
,controller_equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,vod_library_nm IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_controller.add, parms=' || controller_location_id || '|' || controller_nm || '|' || controller_abbreviated_nm || '|' || controller_equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || vod_library_nm || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_controller a
(
a.controller_location_id
,a.controller_nm
,a.controller_abbreviated_nm
,a.controller_equip_prod_inst_id
,a.vod_library_nm
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.controller_location_id
,add.controller_nm
,add.controller_abbreviated_nm
,add.controller_equip_prod_inst_id
,add.vod_library_nm
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_controller.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,controller_location_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_controller.del, parms=' || controller_location_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_controller a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.controller_location_id = del.controller_location_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_controller.del');

END del;

END da_controller;
